events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate on May 1st.
The application was reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster due to relevant software developer experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to handle this candidate and coordinate next steps.
Conducted an initial phone screening to evaluate the candidateâ€™s software development skills and cultural fit.
Received a prompt and positive response from the candidate confirming availability for the technical interview.
Scheduled the technical interview with the engineering panel for May 6th at 10 AM to evaluate coding skills.
